Moyenei

Moyenei is an American performer, actor, songwriter, producer, and entrepreneur. All his songs are his personal work of art

Play Video
About me
In 2010, released his debut studio album, Oore, which debuted at the top of the Billboard 200 charts and was later certified platinum. Subsequently, he will release two more studio albums, Take Care and Nothing Was the Same, which. Music Produser; Vibrational Alchemist Nebo articulates bridges into the space-time of light through his expression of music. When tuned in, your senses connect you with the omni multiverse. Expanding the dimensions of the mind. Truth is in the frequencies, and through God’s will, Music will unify us all.
